SELECT u.sale_id, u.user_id, s.bind_user_num, u.true_name, u.phone, c.company_name, DATE_FORMAT(u.bind_sale_time, '%Y-%c-%e %T') AS bind_sale_time, c.work_address FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN sale_info s ON u.sale_id=s.sale_id LEFT JOIN certification c ON u.user_id=c.user_id LEFT JOIN ordera o ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE u.true_name LIKE '%${value}%' AND u.sale_id =#{saleId} OR u.phone LIKE '%${value}%' AND u.sale_id =#{saleId} OR c.company_name LIKE '%${value}%' AND u.sale_id =#{saleId} GROUP BY u.user_id
ORDER BY bind_sale_time DESC
ORDER BY o.created DESC
LIMIT ${page.currentNumber},${page.numberPerPage}

SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT count(0) FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN sale_info s ON u.sale_id=s.sale_id LEFT JOIN certification c ON u.user_id=c.user_id LEFT JOIN ordera o ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE u.true_name LIKE '%${value}%' AND u.sale_id =#{saleId} OR u.phone LIKE '%${value}%' AND u.sale_id =#{saleId} OR c.company_name LIKE '%${value}%' AND u.sale_id =#{saleId} GROUP BY u.user_id ) AS a

SELECT IF(COUNT(o.user_id) IS NOT NULL,COUNT(o.user_id),0) AS orderaCount, (IF(ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_haocai),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_haocai),2),0)+IF(ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_gongju),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_gongju),2),0))- (IF(ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_gongju),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_gongju),2),0)+IF(ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_haocai),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_haocai),2),0)) AS orderaMoneyCount FROM sale_income si LEFT JOIN ordera o ON si.order_id=o.order_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON o.user_id=u.user_id WHERE si.sale_id=#{saleId} AND si.created > u.bind_sale_time AND si.order_id IN(SELECT order_id FROM ordera WHERE user_id=#{userId})
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y-%c-%e %T') AS latelyOrderDate FROM ordera WHERE user_id=#{userId} LIMIT 1
